welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wayne, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your visit and take time to explore all the wonderful sights and experiences our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Teterboro Airport is dedicated to private and corporate flights, with exclusive amenities and services.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Teterboro Airport handles commercial flights from select airlines, with a focus on regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo shipments and freight services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to JetBlue Airways and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to United Airlines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connection in certain areas.
